casebody.data:
STATE
v.
William A. LUCAS-BEY. No. 89P07-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 10, 2008. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Stuart Albright, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of March 2008 by Defendant for Notice of Appeal (Constitutional Question):

"Motion Dismissed ex mero motu by order of the Court in conference this the 10th day of April 2008."
